verbs.description: [ARG0: Kelli Ward , a top Republican candidate in the Arizona Senate primary ,] [V: claims] [ARG1: President Donald Trump told her that former Maricopa County Sheriff Joe Arpaio should n’t run . When did this happen ? In a video obtained by the Arizona Republic , Ward made the comment as she addressed supporters May 24 . She referred to a conversation she had with Trump last year . Ward said she was with her husband and daughter when she was introduced to Trump at his Mar - A - Lago resort ,] the report said . Trump “ basically knew everything that was going on in Arizona and in the race , ” Ward said . " You know , he had his opinions . ” “ He was like , ' You 're up 15 points on Martha [ McSally ] , and , you know , Joe should n't get in ' — he had a few other things to say about that . I 'll keep that to myself , " Ward said . One of the dynamics at play is that Ward and Arpaio could split the conservative vote in the …

In a video obtained by the Arizona Republic , Ward made the comment as she addressed supporters May 24 . She referred to a conversation she had with Trump last year . Ward said she was with her husband and daughter when she was introduced to Trump at his Mar - A - Lago resort , the report said . Trump “ basically knew everything that was going on in Arizona and in the race , ” Ward said . " You know , he had his opinions . ” “ He was like , ' You 're up 15 points on Martha [ McSally ] , and , you know , Joe should n't get in ' — he had a few other things to say about that .
